name: creamingo-monorepo
description: Creamingo - Complete cake ordering platform with frontend, admin panel, and backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:frontend" "pnpm run dev:admin" "pnpm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:admin && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules admin-panel/node_modules backend/node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
